product_name: Gracie by Soybu Olivia Skirt - Girls'
long_description: Easy-care and stylish, the girls' Gracie by Soybu Olivia Skirt provides double the fun with a burnout print that reverses to a rich solid color. With a tall, flattering waistband and easy A-line silhouette, the Olivia sports a cute peek-a-boo solid hem when the print side is worn. Having the added bonus of 2 skirts in 1 makes it the perfect, packable travel skirt. The Gracie by Soybu Olivia Skirt is designed to stay vibrant and fresh after dozens of cool-water washings.
short_description: Easy-care and stylish, the girls' Gracie by Soybu Olivia Skirt provides double the fun with a burnout print that reverses to a rich solid color.
